website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers GOrun 600 was considered a success. Most runners welcomed its comfortable construction, its stylish looks, and its versatile functionality. There were apparently some issues with this neutral shoe support and upper construction, but those complaints weren’t many. People still lauded this road companion’s efficacy.
pros: The design of the Skechers GOrun 600 was deemed stylish by most consumers
A lot of purchasers used this model for casual walks and traveling
they noted that it functioned well
The underfoot cushioning system was agreeable and responsive, stated several runners
Some people noticed that the materials were durable and of high quality
A reviewer commented that this shoe didn’t need a break-in period
it was comfortable right out of the box
Several users praised the lightness of the shoe
cons: A tester reported that the upper separated from the sole unit after only a few weeks
The shoe does not offer the expected amount of foot support, according to some wearers

customer_reviews.title: I hate going shoe shopping
customer_reviews.text: I hate going shoe shopping. I did a little reading, found these and took a chance (1st time ordering shoes). They showed up well packaged. Tried them on. Very comfortable, light weight, sized as expected. I am usually SUPER picky about buying shoes and wear them until they fall apart (and beyond). I have to admit, this was a lot better than going to the store and the shoes are all I expected (thank goodness).
customer_reviews.author: Dj Rockerfeller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe (but you may need to go up a half size)!
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a half size up but Amazon switched them out with no problems whatsoever. Excellent ease of return/exchange. Now for the Skechers, these shoes are very comfortable! I own many Skechers, usually buying the Ultra's for comfort, but they no longer had any Ultra's in my size so I took a chance on a different Skechers shoe and I couldn't be happier with this one. They are as comfortable as my Skecher Ultra's at half the price. I normally buy size 11.5 but I had to get size 12 in these, so I would suggest ordering a half size up. You won't be disappointed in the comfort of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight N Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Now I don't have to buy Nike
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy Nike but not anymore. Glad to find Sketchers makes great running shoes. Right as I put these on for the first time I could tell I was going to like them. I've had shoes in the past where something didn't feel 100% right and so I gave them a chance to "break in" - sometimes it would settle and feel comfortable, sometimes not. These shoes are very comfortable and provide great heel cushioning for running/jogging. They're also stylish enough to wear to work.
customer_reviews.author: Morph

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfy inside
customer_reviews.text: When I first put them on I was wondering if they were too tight as I was going to use them on a tour through parts of Europe, lots of walking. Wore them a few times and they loosened a bit quickly. Nice and comfy inside, my brother warned me that although it would be comfortable at first the lack of support inside would be bad. But wearing them for a good 12+ hours every day on a 2 week trip I had no problems whatsoever, very happy with my purchase. Be aware of climate though, they are breezy which is nice in warmer weather but cold toes when I was in colder areas.
customer_reviews.author: Onyx

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super lightweight! I usually need to put inserts into all of my shoes, but, I don't really need to do so with these. Also, I am a female with large feet, so, sometimes I find men's shoes fit better. Will be ordering more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: My feet say two thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable pair of shoes, I own several pairs of Skechers and this pair is the best of them all. I don't run so I don't know how the would perform in that aspect but I'm on my feet most of the day and my feet say two thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.author: Larry N.

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are extremely well cushioned and I have another pair that I run and walk moderate distances in. The durability may be a bit of an issue but if they’re uncomfortable it doesn’t matter if they last forever. They are a good value for walkers, moderate runners and people who have to stand on hard surfaces for long periods. Long distant runners might need someone a little more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight use shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I wear leather tennis shoes regularly & bought these to specifically use on the treadmill for their light weight and cushioned support. I am careful to place shoe trees in them after use and limit the general wear as I use them just for working out. I bought them in May of 2018 and the eyelet failed yesterday, so December of 2019. That's 18 months which I suppose isn't too bad. Still, I would call them a $25 shoe as opposed to $52. If I wore them normally, I am sure they wouldn't have made six months. I won't be buying another pair as they are too flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: ... the major brands and just could not find a good fit. These shoes are perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and I tried all of the major brands and just could not find a good fit. These shoes are perfect. The fit is great and comfortable! I started working out again and I have no leg or foot fatigue after 60 min on a treadmill. I will be sticking with Skechers as long as they are in business! Thank you Skechers for a great pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Michele L. Mengert

customer_reviews.title: Five 🌟 running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I used reviews at runrepeat and once again I was not disappointed. I really love the comfort and support I feel while I run with these. I will purchase these again it needed. Coming from Brooks and Saucony, not much different but they did feel slightly tight at first but that's gone.
customer_reviews.author: pistol pete

customer_reviews.title: Performance shoe for the office
customer_reviews.text: Although these are considered performance shoes, I just use these as my work shoes at the office. For that they are extremely comfortable and snug. In plain black they blend in and don't look out of place. Very breathable, light, and has an overall good fit like an athletic shoe. I would buy again if they are available next time as long as they make them in black.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Cart

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: One word WOW! These are probably the most comfortable shoes I've ever owned I thought ASIC'S were comfortable but these take the prize. I can wear these all day. Bought two pair already. I'm definitely buying another pair or two. They aren't bad looking either quite stylish. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Very poor stability.
customer_reviews.text: I like Skechers, they are very soft on the foot. However, this particular model has little to no stability. That is, the design allows your foot to move around to the right/left. It doesn't stabilize your foot. Therefore, I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: An Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: So far I love these shoes. Great for running, comfortable for walking and really well supported. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Bakalski

customer_reviews.title: Will keep ordering these as long as they keep making them
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my feet all day as a photographer / filmmaker and these shoes ROCK! They run about a 1/2 size small so keep that in mind. I wear a 12 and ordered a 12 1/2 and they fit perfectly. They're so lightweight, it barely feels like you're wearing shoes. Great sole and support too.
customer_reviews.author: VinC710Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: The best running show I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I have never had a running show this comfy. The insole is so pleasant and the wide fit is perfect for someone with flat feet like me. I also have under Armour and they are good but not this comfy. Skechers takes the price for comfort and support. I will be trying some of there other items.
customer_reviews.author: Bighal

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, I'm a bit of a chubby runner, so bought them for my beach runs, and they work great. A bit narrow and I'd say I have average sized feet, but overall excellent shoes. I wear them for travel too.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable! Durability concerns?
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable pair of shoes I've ever had. The only downside is that they aren't as durable as my other pairs of shoes even with less miles on them. I've worn a deep crater into the outsole where the balls of my feet are within 6 months, making it rather slippery/hydroplane-y [sic] on rainy days.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ho

customer_reviews.title: Light, Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, very light, and the size seems true. Decent cushioning for exercising, but maybe not enough for long distance jogging on pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Semprini

customer_reviews.title: Great fit great run.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the money. Husband is a runner and this is his third pair. He does use and inner sole in all his running shoes though.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy M.

customer_reviews.title: it was comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: this shoe didn’t need a break-in period; it was comfortable right out of the box. Very comfort shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: light weight comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes primarily for walking and wearing around the house. They are very light weight but yet they seem to have adequate arch support. They are the most comfortable shoes I have purchased and are very good looking.
customer_reviews.author: wyomingcamper

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned! No joke. No break in period at all. They are like walking on clouds. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: RDF

customer_reviews.title: Walking on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, smart style. First pair of skechers and very satisfied! Like walking on a cloud. Purchased some fresh socks and took on the payment of Las Vegas. Feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: comfortable shoes, very good on impact. these are the second skechers i have owned and wont be the last
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected finish residues with convenient fitting
customer_reviews.text: The shoe tip doesn’t look like the picture or even close the picture contains tiny piece of dry clue in reality look like it is not seated well plus full of clue residues I didn’t like the finish of the bottom of the shoe looks worth than the picture Size fits well
customer_reviews.author: haytham

customer_reviews.title: I love Skechers
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is absolutely amazing. I'm definitely going to get another pair hopefully in another color. I have amazing arch support. And the material is very breathable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Worrell

customer_reviews.title: Can get it as that price, Thumb up !
customer_reviews.text: All as expected as Skechers products used to be !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. I play tennis for hours
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I play tennis for hours, badminton and have run in them for about 20 miles. Feet are still comfortable after activity. They still look good. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Tran

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: fits perfectly, great price and received product quickly! recommend the shoes and the seller for great service!
customer_reviews.author: wildaboutu

customer_reviews.title: Thes shoes are very comfortable and the all black color means I can wear ...
customer_reviews.text: Thes shoes are very comfortable and the all black color means I can wear them to work in the office.
customer_reviews.author: mark baker

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoes I have ever had. I use mainly for daily walking. I have another shoes for running.
customer_reviews.author: S. AL-GHAMDI

customer_reviews.title: Best running/walking shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes I have bought in years. Most likely will by a second pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe I’ve ever worn
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Valet in Vegas. Only wear Sketchers. Get about 5 months of use out of them, with every day wear. Most comfortable shoe I’ve ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe. Comfortable. Can even wear to church with slacks or jeans. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I have good luck with the fit of Sketchers
customer_reviews.text: Gonna be my new favorites. I have good luck with the fit of Sketchers. They look good too.
customer_reviews.author: daniel pisani

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good support
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of these I have boughten. I almost wear nothing else in the way of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Val E Strode

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. And price is right. My new everyday shoes. Will buy again when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Corey C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I use them for work and walking.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.Carbajal

customer_reviews.title: It’s difficult to get the correct size in repeat orders ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s difficult to get the correct size in repeat orders - some too small and these were too large after reading other revues that they might be small.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is light and extremely comfortable. It is exactly as described. There is nothing that I didn’t like about it.
customer_reviews.author: David Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable sneaker I've owned yet. Ended up getting a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: R A

customer_reviews.title: Bought these so I could walk around Disney
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I'm on my feet all day at work and was worried about how it would hold up, but my knees feel great after an eight hour shift, and my feet don't get hot and tired like they used to. Can't wait to take them to Disney in January!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i brought for my dad he said he like his shoes they really look nice he said there ...
customer_reviews.text: i brought for my dad he said he like his shoes they really look nice he said there are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: BY U

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable . Light . Nice grip . Happy with it .
customer_reviews.author: Nahed

customer_reviews.title: The most what I like about the shoes they're very very comfortable I'm on ...
customer_reviews.text: The most what I like about the shoes they're very very comfortable I'm on my feet 7 hours a day I feel I'm walking on pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for running and walking sometimes the gym.
customer_reviews.author: larry wilson

customer_reviews.title: They are great running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect. I use them to run three miles six times a week. I also use them to run 5k races. After a run or race I never feel any pain. They are great.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne 731

customer_reviews.title: Perfect road running shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Felt perfect on my foot the first moment I put it on! Could use a bit more grip but it's totally fine for asphalt.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: I am very comfortable during long distance
customer_reviews.text: Ideal running shoes, fits as expected. I am very comfortable during long distance runs
customer_reviews.author: Ali Demir

customer_reviews.title: Light weight shoes
customer_reviews.text: I tried these on but aren't planning on wearing them for a while. I like the way they fit and are light which is important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Cretty

customer_reviews.title: Super light
customer_reviews.text: I run on a treadmill daily. Love them. Super comfortable and light.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent run/socializing shoe
customer_reviews.text: Got exceptionally stinky when wet. Insoles are glued in. Overall awesome though
customer_reviews.author: Dan P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes
customer_reviews.text: They are a perfect fit and arrived a week earlier than the estimated day of delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Henk Egberts

customer_reviews.title: Another great style
customer_reviews.text: Been a Skechers fan for more than 5 years. Need I say more.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander L.

customer_reviews.title: Considering this is a “medium width”, the shoe is ...
customer_reviews.text: Considering this is a “medium width”, the shoe is almost too wide for my foot. They are extremely light and very cushioned. I haven’t worn them for a long enough distance to know if they will actually work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: it fits like its suppose to
customer_reviews.text: it fits like its suppose to, glad of it the last pair i had were too tight and if this one was also i was going to send them back and go someplace else to buy my shoes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best running and workout shoe I have ever bought! I love them.
customer_reviews.author: James McIlroy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little on the small side but still LOVE them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Great value,only had them for a week now. super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: bryan pendley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, light weight
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Ordered a half size larger than usual as recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Glavan

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, being wearing them everyday and I'd buy them again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Go Run 600 55061-ccbl Low-Top Sneakers
